customer_reviews.title: Excellent Longlasting Broom with Libman Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought my last Libman Precision Angle broom from Amazon in September 2013 and have just designated it as a porch broom, August 2017! Am buying a new identical one, I like the 11-inch sweep of bristles for my small home, particularly on the bamboo flooring. (They now have large and extra large sizes of this style.) Libman has excellent cleaning products. It would be helpful if illustration showed the top of the handle which would immediately answer people's questions about whether it can be hung on a nail. It has roomy rectangular opening and the top 2 1/2-3 inches is textured in such a way that it stays perfectly in my round broom holder. Please see pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing

This was the tallest one I could find at a reasonable price. Nothing really special about it - but so far the top part with hole for hanging is staying put. Could probably find comparable broom at better price at local grocery center.

product_meta.title: Libman 201 Precision Angle Broom with Recycled Broom Fibers
product_meta.description: Make a clean sweep with Libman Precision Angle Broom. This extra wide broom makes maintaining hard floor surfaces simple, from wood and concrete floors to tile and linoleum. The Libman angle broom has a steel handle connected to a one-piece resin block with strong polymer fibers that grip dirt and dust for effortless cleaning. The rugged bristles are crafted from a special, fiber made from recycled PET bottles. A wide 11" sweeping surface facilitates faster cleaning. The angled bristles can reach places that dust and dirt collects much easier than traditional straight edges, making easy work of sweeping up under cabinets, furniture and even in tight corners. Pair the cleaning broom with the Libman 10" White Wide Scoop Dust Pan to tackle even your toughest tasks. Additional Libman products are sold separately.
feature_bullets: Precisely cut to reach under tight corners indoors and outdoors
Flagged broom fibers result in more debris moved with every sweep
Longer life than your typical broom, with environmentally friendly, recycled broom fibers made from water bottles
53.5" steel broom handle with a 7" plastic broom block and 11" sweeping surface.
